messages.bad_search: Oops! It seems that your search was too short or incorrect :(

chatbot.ask_guidance: Do you need some guidance with this page?

waiting.user_return: Hello again! How was your adventure? Can I help you in something??
waiting.bot_waiting: Okey! I'm going to be here if you need some help, just ask for me!!

rolling_back.user_sorry: I understand, I'm so sorry and I don't want to offend you, majesty. I'll try again.
rolling_back.user_sorry_bot_response: I hope so. That's what I was talking about. It's feels soo great... Okey, go on. Do you need something else?

user_status.good: Excelent! I'm so happy for that!
user_status.bad: Oh, i'm so sorry about that. I'll do my best for you!

ask_help.help_confirmed: Great! Take a look at this tutorial options:
ask_help.more_help: Can I help you in anything more?

main_help.user_help_requested: Okey, what do you need to know about the users in this page?
main_help.search_help_requested: Okey, what do you need to know about the searching in this page?
main_help.lists_help_requested: Okey, what do you need to know about the lists in this page?

about_my_info.label: About your info in this page:

dont_understood.anything: Okey, stop trying to ask me weird things, i'm smarter than you, remember that, so only asK mE thE THINgs I ALLOW YOU! >:(
dont_understood.an_status: That's good or bad? Please, try to communicate with HUMANS, no ALIENS ;)
dont_understood.an_answer: That's a yes?? Can you open your mouth a bit more...? Open your hand, I mean...? Ok, forgive that.

errors.no_list_created: You need to create a list to keep favorite content in touch!

buttons.open_chatbot: Open HAL-9001 to take some guidance about how to use this page!
